channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- QuBot
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- QuBot

item.title: CVE-2023-2399|2023-06-19T10:52:51.650Z -- unknown -- qubot
item.description: The QuBot WordPress plugin before 1.1.6 doesn't filter user input on chat, leading to bad code inserted on it be reflected on the user dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2023-2401|2023-06-19T10:52:46.396Z -- unknown -- qubot
item.description: The QuBot WordPress plugin before 1.1.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
